prompt:
You are provided with a list of characters, evidences and testimonies.
Characters:
Character 0
Name: Athena Cykes
Description: The latest lawyer to join our agency. She lived in Europe for a time, where she studied psychology.
Character 1
Name: Phoenix Wright
Description: The head of our office. He was retired once, but made his return to the legal world a few months ago.
Character 2
Name: Apollo Justice
Description: The lawyer at my agency who was attacked during the court bombing trial. He's currently recovering at the hospital.
Character 3
Name: Trucy Wright
Description: An aspiring magician who Mr. Wright adopted when duty called.
Character 4
Name: Clay Terran
Description: The victim in this case. He was a HAT-2 crew member and a close friend of mine.
Character 5
Name: Juniper Woods
Description: Athena's childhood friend. Talented singer and Student Council President, she is studying to be a judge.
Character 6
Name: Solomon Starbuck
Description: The defendant in this case. He was a HAT-2 crew member and a mentor to the victim.
Character 7
Name: Simon Blackquill
Description: A prosecutor and prison inmate. He can manipulate witnesses through the power of suggestion.
Character 8
Name: Bobby Fulbright
Description: The detective assigned to this case. He led the evacuation effort at the Space Center after the bombing incident.
Character 9
Name: Candice Arme
Description: A detective who specialized in bomb cases. Was on detail at the Space Center. One of the first to find the body.
Character 10
Name: Yuri Cosmos
Description: The director of the Space Center and one of the first people to discover the body. He seems exceedingly full of himself.
Character 11
Name: Ponco
Description: A guide robot at the Space Center. She can provide information on the Center and show people around.
Character 12
Name: Aura Blackquill
Description: A researcher who's developing robots at the Space Center. She is Prosecutor Blackquill's older sister.
Character 13
Name: Clonco
Description: One of the robots developed by Aura, who refers to him as "Hunk of Junk".
Evidences:
Evidence 0
Name: Attorney's Badge
Description: My cherished attorney's badge. Just putting it on makes me feel... ready.* (when playing as Apollo Justice) It's my all-important badge. Proof of my profession.* (when playing as Phoenix Wright)
Evidence 1
Name: Terran's Autopsy Report
Description: Cause of death: Stabbing. The victim was discovered in the third-floor boarding lounge in the main building.
Evidence 2
Name: Space Center Diagram
Description: A cross-section view of the main building of the Space Center and Launch Pad 1.
Evidence 3
Name: Utility Knife
Description: The victim's blood was found on its blade, but no fingerprints could be lifted. It has the victim's blood on it. From a set of utility tools used by Space Center techs.
Evidence 4
Name: Bombing Report
Description: The explosions sparked a fire on the second floor of the main building and the middle level of the launch pad near the elevator.
Evidence 5
Name: Evacuation Report
Description: The bombs went off despite tight security. Police officers and riot police who had been standing by gave the evacuation instructions.
Evidence 6
Name: Launch Pad 1 Door Lock
Description: A biometric door lock operated by fingerprint recognition. Only the defendant, the victim, and the Space Center director had access. Starbuck's prints were found on this door lock. Also see photo taken after the incident. (2 pages.)
Evidence 7
Name: Security Camera Video
Description: Video showing the defendant and victim's escape from the corridor to the boarding lounge. Video showing the defendant and victim's escape from the corridor. The video ends immediately after this scene.
Evidence 8
Name: Oxygen Tank Data
Description: The victim's tank was ruptured, with 0% left. The defendant's had 80%. Remaining oxygen is displayed on left shoulder. The victim's oxygen tank was struck by a bullet.
Evidence 9
Name: Space Center Pamphlet
Description: A pamphlet for visitors to the Space Center. It includes a diagram of the boarding lounge. It includes a diagram of the boarding lounge and a cross-section view of the Space Center. (3 pages.)
Evidence 10
Name: Bullet Hole
Description: A single bullet hole was found in the boarding lounge. The bullet itself is missing. The only bullet hole found in the boarding lounge. It was made by a bullet fired from a .38-caliber gun.
Evidence 11
Name: Control Room Door Lock
Description: The door lock to the east. It can only be operated by the director. Backup power lets it function even when the power goes out.
Evidence 12
Name: Bullet
Description: Discovered in a gutter that runs along the south wall of the boarding lounge. It was fired from a .10 caliber handgun.
Evidence 13
Name: "Hope" Capsule
Description: Found in the victim's possession. It recently returned from a seven-year mission and contains asteroid samples.
Evidence 14
Name: Aura's Statement
Description: The perp held a lighter with an Earth emblem on it in their left hand, and a knife in their right.
Evidence 15
Name: Bullet from Arme's Gun
Description: The bullet found near the victim's oxygen tank. It was fired from a .38 caliber handgun.
Evidence 16
Name: Lighter
Description: The lighter found on the floor of the Space Museum. The true culprit's fingerprints are on it in the victim's blood. Evidence found by Detective Fulbright. It has Athena's prints on it in the victim's blood.

Testimonies:
Testimony 0
Testimony: All I did was support Clay over my shoulder and get us out of the rocket!
Person: Starbuck
Testimony 1
Testimony: Like always, I took the elevator down to the middle level and headed for the corridor.
Person: Starbuck
Testimony 2
Testimony: Clay had passed out by the time we got the order to evacuate.
Person: Starbuck
Testimony 3
Testimony: I didn't kill Clay! I was trying to save him!
Person: Starbuck

Which evidence and testimony contradict each other? You must only answer one pair. You may output an explanation, but your answer must end with a JSON format like so: {"evidence": 2, "testimony": 3}. The answer JSON should strictly be the last line, followed by nothing else.
cot:
The pair that contradict each other is Evidence 16 (Lighter) and Testimony 3 (Starbuck).

Explanation:
- Testimony 3 by Starbuck claims innocence: "I didn't kill Clay! I was trying to save him!"
- Evidence 16 shows the lighter with Athena's prints in the victim's blood, found by Detective Fulbright. This implies that the true culprit held a lighter with evidence at the scene, which contradicts Starbuck's claim of innocence if he was indeed the culprit. However, since the prints are Athena's, it implicates someone else and does not necessarily contradict Starbuck directly. 

So, let's look at another contradiction.

Evidence 0 (Attorney's Badge) has no direct contradicting testimony.

Evidence 6 (Launch Pad 1 Door Lock) indicates only the defendant, victim, and Space Center director had access. This may contradict any testimony denying access.

Starbuckâ€™s Testimony 1: "Like always, I took the elevator down to the middle level and headed for the corridor."

Evidence 4 (Bombing Report): explosions sparked fire on second floor and middle level near elevator.

If Starbuck says he took the elevator down to the middle level, but evidence shows the elevator area was compromised with explosions and fire, this may be a contradiction regarding movement.

However, this is circumstantial and does not directly contradict his testimony.

Testimony 0 by Starbuck: "All I did was support Clay over my shoulder and get us out of the rocket!"

But Evidence 8 (Oxygen Tank Data) shows victim's oxygen tank was ruptured by a bullet, suggesting shooting, while Starbuck claims to only carry Clay.

Testimony 2: "Clay had passed out by the time we got the order to evacuate."

Evidence 7 (Security Camera Video) shows the defendant and victim's escape from the corridor to the boarding lounge, ending abruptly.

If Starbuck claims to be supporting Clay out of the rocket, but video shows movement only of the victim and defendant to boarding lounge, this can be a contradiction.

There's a stronger contradiction between Evidence 16 (Lighter with Athena's prints), which suggests Athena's involvement, and the initial assumption of suspects.

But no direct contradictory testimony from Athena is presented.

Looking more closely, Evidence 14 (Aura's Statement): The perp held a lighter with an Earth emblem on it in their left hand, and a knife in their right.

Evidence 16 says the lighter found has Athena's prints in victim's blood.

But Athena is not a suspect and no testimony from her is given.

Thus, contradiction involving Starbuck's claim of innocence (Testimony 3) and clear evidence of a weapon (knife and lighter) presence does apply to Starbuck.

He denies killing but being found with the lighter and knife in the victim's blood contradicts that.

Therefore, the strongest contradiction is Evidence 16 and Testimony 3.

Person: Starbuck

Person: Starbuck
Testimony 2
Testimony: With the capsule and Clay in my arms, I made my way down from the upper level.
Person: Starbuck

Which evidence and testimony contradict each other? You must only answer one pair. You may output an explanation, but your answer must end with a JSON format like so: {"evidence": 2, "testimony": 3}. The answer JSON should strictly be the last line, followed by nothing else.
cot:
The evidence that may contradict the testimonies is Evidence 7 (Security Camera Video) and the testimonies from Starbuck (Testimonies 0 and 1). 

Evidence 7 shows video of the defendant (Starbuck) and the victim's escape from the corridor to the boarding lounge. This video ends right after showing their escape. However, Starbuck's testimonies about his escape route seem inconsistent and uncertain. Specifically:

- Testimony 0: "Let's see... Uh, my escape route... What I said before was a mistake."
- Testimony 1: "I, uh, I remember now! I took a different route... Maybe... Probably..."

Starbuck appears unsure and changes his story about his escape route, whereas the security camera video would provide a clear record of the actual route they took. Therefore, the video evidence contradicts Starbuck's shaky and contradictory testimonies.
